citations.desc: ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
citations.narrative:
There is a written program of veterinary care but the last site visit by the veterinarian has been over a year ago on
June 7, 2013. Regular inspections by attending veterinarians are required in order to ensure adequate veterinary
care at the facility. The licensee shall employ an attending veterinarian under formal arrangements and must
schedule regular visits to the premises.
To be corrected by: August 29, 2014
Exit interview conducted with licensee.

narrative:
2.40(a)(1)
ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
There is a written program of veterinary care but the last site visit by the veterinarian has been over a year ago on
June 7, 2013. Regular inspections by attending veterinarians are required in order to ensure adequate veterinary
care at the facility. The licensee shall employ an attending veterinarian under formal arrangements and must
schedule regular visits to the premises. 
To be corrected by: August 29, 2014
Exit interview conducted with licensee.
